title: Suspicious Phishing Domain Detected
description: Domain 'paypal-security-verification.com' appears to be a phishing site targeting PayPal users. Multiple reports indicate this domain is being used to steal login credentials.

title: Malware Distribution Site Identified
description: Domain 'free-software-downloads.net' has been identified as distributing malware disguised as legitimate software downloads.

title: Suspicious Banking Domain
description: Domain 'chase-bank-verification.org' appears to be impersonating Chase Bank for phishing purposes.

title: Cryptocurrency Scam Site
description: Domain 'bitcoin-investment-opportunity.com' is promoting a cryptocurrency investment scam with promises of unrealistic returns.

title: Data Breach Alert - User Database Compromised
description: Suspected data breach involving user credentials from multiple websites. Compromised data includes email addresses and hashed passwords.

title: Suspicious Domain with Typosquatting
description: Domain 'gooogle.com' appears to be typosquatting Google's domain and may be used for malicious purposes.

title: Fake Social Media Login Page
description: Domain 'facebook-login-security.com' is hosting a fake Facebook login page designed to steal user credentials.
resolution: Domain has been taken down and reported to hosting provider.

title: Suspicious Email Campaign
description: Mass email campaign detected using domain 'urgent-security-update.net' to distribute phishing emails.
